heading: HB00081
0: AN ACT PRESCRIBING A MANDATORY OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY, HEALTH, AND EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM FOR ALL ARTISTS IN THE FILM, TELEVISION, AND THEATER INDUSTRIES OF THE PHILIPPINES, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
short-title: Prescribing A Mandatory Occupational Safety, Health, And Emergency Response Program For All Artists In The Film, Television, And Theater Industries Of The Philippines
principal-authors: ONG, RONNIE L.; DELOS SANTOS, ALFRED C.;
status: Pending with the Committee on LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT since 2019-07-23
